info.name: dark/u/
info.description: An attempt at creating a more readable, low-contrast version of the original site. Includes several padding changes, a generally lowered saturation, darker grays rather than blacks, etc. Also includes a custom logo / background on the main board picker page for the sake of additional flair.
info.additionalInfo:
Both images from the main page taken from VA-11 Hall-A.
Written over the course of a couple of days.
